testcase.name: Test the Home functionality when user clicks on 'Home' button.
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the Home page........................................passed Then Home button should be enabled..........................................passed And image, H1 'Automation Exercise' , H2 'Full-Fledged practice website for Automation Engineers' and paragraph 'All QA engineers can use this website' should be visible.passed And TestCases and APIsList buttons should be displayed......................passed And Features items, Category and Brands should be displayed.................passed

testcase.name: Test the Scroll Up functionality using 'Arrow' button.
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the Home page........................................passed Then Home button should be enabled..........................................passed And image, H1 'Automation Exercise' , H2 'Full-Fledged practice website for Automation Engineers' and paragraph 'All QA engineers can use this website' should be visible.passed And TestCases and APIsList buttons should be displayed......................passed When the user scroll down to the footer.....................................passed Then 'Arrow' button should be displayed.....................................passed When user click on 'Arrow' button...........................................passed Then user should be navigated to the top of the page and H1 'Automation Exercise' , H2 'Full-Fledged practice website for Automation Engineers' should be visible.passed And TestCases and APIsList buttons should be displayed......................passed

testcase.name: Test the Scroll Up functionality without using 'Arrow' button.
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the Home page........................................passed Then Home button should be enabled..........................................passed And image, H1 'Automation Exercise' , H2 'Full-Fledged practice website for Automation Engineers' and paragraph 'All QA engineers can use this website' should be visible.passed And TestCases and APIsList buttons should be displayed......................passed When the user scroll down to the footer.....................................passed Then 'Arrow' button should be displayed.....................................passed When user scroll up to the top..............................................passed Then user should be navigated to the top of the page and H1 'Automation Exercise' , H2 'Full-Fledged practice website for Automation Engineers' should be visible.passed And TestCases and APIsList buttons should be displayed......................passed

testcase.name: Test the 'User SignUp' functionality when user enter valid data to signUp and enter valid data to Create New Account.
testcase.system-out: Given the user launches the browser and navigates to the home page..........passed When the user clicks on Signup OR Login button..............................passed Then 'New User Signup!' and Signup button should be visible.................passed When the user enters name as "Hassan" and email address as "Hassan2003@gmail.com".passed And clicks 'Signup' button..................................................passed Then 'ENTER ACCOUNT INFORMATION' should be visible..........................passed When the user fills in the details: select Title, Name , Email, Password as "Hassan2003", Date of birth.passed And selects the checkbox 'Sign up for our newsletter!'......................passed And selects the checkbox 'Receive special offers from our partners!'........passed And fills in the details: First name as "Hassan", Last name as "Ahmed", Company as "Amit Learning", Address as "123 Abdelaziz Street", Address_2 as "Apt 4B", select Country, State as "Single", City as "Alex", Zipcode as "M5H 2N2", Mobile Number as "01122334455".passed And clicks 'Create Account' button..........................................passed Then 'ACCOUNT CREATED!' and continue button should be visible...............passed When the user clicks 'Continue' button......................................passed Then 'Logged in as username' , delete account button and logout button should be visible.passed

testcase.name: Test the 'User SignUp' functionality when using an already used Email Address.
testcase.system-out: Given the user launches the browser and navigates to the home page..........passed When the user clicks on Signup OR Login button..............................passed Then 'New User Signup!' and Signup button should be visible.................passed When the user enters name as "Mazen" and email address as "Mazen2000@gmail.com".passed And clicks 'Signup' button..................................................passed Then an error message 'Email Address already exist!' should be appeared and signUp button should be displayed.passed

testcase.name: Test the 'Delete Account' functionality when user create an Account and delete it.

testcase.name: Test the Search functionality when user Search for a product.
testcase.system-out: Given the user go to the browser and navigates to the home page.............passed When user clicks 'products' button..........................................passed Then 'All Products' should be visible.......................................passed And 'Search' field and button should be displayed...........................passed When the user enters the product name as "MEN" in the search input..........passed And clicks 'Search' button..................................................passed Then 'SEARCHED PRODUCTS' should be displayed................................passed And all the products related to the search should be displayed..............passed

testcase.name: Test the Search functionality when user Navigate through categories and sub-categories.
testcase.system-out: Given the user go to the browser and navigates to the home page.............passed When user clicks 'products' button..........................................passed Then 'All Products' should be visible.......................................passed And 'Search' field and button and 'category' link should be displayed.......passed When the user click on'Women' category......................................passed And click on any category link under 'Women' category, for example: Dress...passed Then category page and confirm text 'WOMEN - TOPS PRODUCTS' should be displayed.passed And all the products related to the search should be displayed..............passed

testcase.name: Test the cart functionality when user add item/s to the cart from the products page.
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to the home page.......................................passed When user clicks on 'products' button.......................................passed And hover over first product and clicks 'add to cart'.......................passed Then success message 'Added!' , view cart link and 'Continue Shopping' button should be displayed.passed When the user click on 'Continue Shopping' button...........................passed And hover over second product and clicks 'add to cart'......................passed Then success message 'Added!' , view cart link and 'Continue Shopping' button should be displayed.passed When user clicks 'view cart' link...........................................passed Then both products should be added to cart, home and Checkout button should be displayed.passed And product details like Item, Description, Price, Quantity and Total should be displayed correctly.passed

testcase.name: Test the cart functionality when user remove item/s from the cart page.
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to the home page.......................................passed When user clicks on 'products' button.......................................passed And hover over first product and clicks 'add to cart'.......................passed Then success message 'Added!' , view cart link and 'Continue Shopping' button should be displayed.passed When the user click on 'Continue Shopping' button...........................passed And hover over second product and clicks 'add to cart'......................passed Then success message 'Added!' , view cart link and 'Continue Shopping' button should be displayed.passed When user clicks 'view cart' link...........................................passed Then both products should be added to cart, home and Checkout button should be displayed.passed And product details like Item, Description, Price, Quantity and Total should be displayed correctly.passed When user clicks 'x' icon to remove the product.............................passed Then product should be removed from the cart page...........................passed

testcase.name: Test the Product Quantity functionality when user Increase quantity of the product.
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to the home page.......................................passed When user clicks on 'products' button.......................................passed And hover over first product and clicks 'view product'......................passed Then Quantity field and 'Add to cart' button should displayed...............passed And Availability, Condition and Brand should be displayed...................passed When user increase the quantity to "4"......................................passed And user clicks on 'Add to cart' button.....................................passed Then success message 'Added!' , view cart link and 'Continue Shopping' button should be displayed.passed When user clicks 'view cart' link...........................................passed Then product should be displayed in cart page with exact quantity as "4"....passed

Could you please provide more details? Thank you!".passed And the user uploads a file.................................................passed And the user clicks the 'Submit' button.....................................passed And the user clicks the OK button...........................................passed Then success message 'Success!
